ModMetaData.name: Universal Pond Stocking + Fish Egg Seeding
ModMetaData.author: ProgrammerLily
ModMetaData.description:
"Why wait for nature when you can play aquaculture god?"
What Does This Do?
Ever looked at a perfectly good pond and thought, "This needs more fish"? Well, now you can do something about it! This mod lets your colonists stock any water source with fish using... fish eggs!
Features:
- Right-click fish eggs, target water, stock fish - Works on any water tile - Fish type checking (no ocean salmon) - Supports Vanilla Fishing Expanded - Configurable via mod settings - Fish eggs appear in trader stock
...and more!
